comments.author: nightzirch.3126
comments.body:
Thank you so much for reply! I will keep an eye on the GitHub repo. Looking forward to the release

You’re doing a good job, Lawton!

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
I haven’t even started on the wardrobe stuff yet. On the API CDI github repo, each pull request is tagged with one of “ready” [to start work], “in progress” or “needs deploy” — these indicate the current development status.

I’ll have a look at the skin unlocks today — it’s a fairly high-value feature and it might only take a day or two to implement (in the happy case, at least).

comments.author: nightzirch.3126
comments.body:
Hi, and sorry if this has been asked and answered before.

I am simply curious what the ETA is on wardrobe data from the account API. I understand if it is difficult to give a specific date, but I am happy with a rough estimate.

Also, great job on the API v2 so far and the API token system!

Can’t wait for more
